entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
